T02TD2317E:261b-1: sam darsha pra d'i pa n'a ma /
T02TD2317E:261b-3: yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
T02TD2317E:261b-4: 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2317E:261b-5: lhan skyes ye shes ster mdzad pa //
T02TD2317E:261b-6: dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dug //
T02TD2317E:261b-7: mtshon chod lta ba ma 'gags pas //
T02TD2317E:262a-1: mtha' kun dang phyogs gcig mthun //
T02TD2317E:262a-2: yin lugs lta ba mtha' dang bral //
T02TD2317E:262a-3: grub mtha' kun gyi blo ma shog / lta ba rgya che mtha' bral ni //
T02TD2317E:262a-4: mtha' bzhi'i skyon dang bral bas na //
T02TD2317E:262a-5: grub mtha' kun la mi gnas pas //
T02TD2317E:262a-6: yang dag lta bar yid ches bya //
T02TD2317E:262a-7: blta bya lta byed gnyis dang bral //
T02TD2317E:262a-8: lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni //
T02TD2317E:262a-9: lta ba'i dam pa kho na yin //
T02TD2317E:262a-10: dngos 'dzin lta ba kun las grol //
T02TD2317E:262a-11: ma rig pa yi mig phye nas //
T02TD2317E:262a-12: ye shes mig gis bltas pas ni //
T02TD2317E:262a-13: rig pa dri ma med pa lta //
T02TD2317E:262a-14: dri med mthong zhes lta ba yin //
T02TD2317E:262a-15: mthong bya mthong byed gnyis bral /
T02TD2317E:262a-17: zung 'jug lta ba gza' gtad med //
T02TD2317E:262a-18: phyag rgya chen po lta mchog yin //
T02TD2317E:262a-19: de nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan ni //
T02TD2317E:262a-20: mtshan nyid bzhi ru shes par bya //
T02TD2317E:262a-21: rig pa dri ma med pa la //
T02TD2317E:262a-22: rnam dag sgrib g-yogs med pas ni //
T02TD2317E:262a-23: gzung 'dzin g-yas yis ma gos pa'o //
T02TD2317E:262a-24: gcig gi sangs rgyas ae ma ho //
T02TD2317E:262a-25: rig pa gcer bur gnas pa la //
T02TD2317E:262a-26: mtshan ma'i gos kyis ma g-yogs pa //
T02TD2317E:262a-27: rang byung ye shes drod po che //
T02TD2317E:262a-28: chags sdang mtshan ma me bzhin sreg / kun shes rig pa rten med pa'o //
T02TD2317E:262a-29: bag chags sbubs su ma zhugs par //
T02TD2317E:262a-30: sdug bsngal 'khor ba gzugs mi dgos //
T02TD2317E:262a-31: 'dod yon sun ma rang sar grol //
T02TD2317E:262a-32: 'dzin med rig pa brling pa ni //
T02TD2317E:262a-33: dngos 'dzin yu ba bud pas na //
T02TD2317E:262a-34: snang grags 'dzin pa nus pa yin //
T02TD2317E:262a-35: phyogs cha med pa'i lta ba'o //
T02TD2317E:262a-36: yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
